name: TV Places (Oculus Quest)
description:
TV Places is a small Oculus Quest Experience that will immerse you on TV Sets of favorite TV Shows.

Currently Locations:
- Monicas Aparment (Friends) with a Connection to Joey and Chandlers Aparment
- Lenard and Sheldons Aparment (Big Bang Theory)

This is a very early access program and will be updated with new content soon.
You can ONLY walk around in the sets.

NOTES: Friends Aparment could be a little bit laggy.
THIS IS AN REALLY EARLY VERSION! BUY AT YOUR OWN RISK.
